name: ORS Count of Prisoners with Disabilities
description:
This report displays the number of prisoners who have a disability, how many have more than one disability and the total number of current prisoners.
The report prompts for Establishment Code(s) and Disability(s) at runtime.
PDD0023 - v00.00.07 Last Modified: 02/06/16

dataset.name: Count of Disabilities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION AS DISABILITY, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'RD', 'PRD') AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE = 'DISAB' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND ((AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Disability (All for all)','A','Personal Care Needs\Disability',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Disability (All for all)','A','Personal Care Needs\Disability',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, DISABILITY, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Count Offenders by Establishment
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Unique Disabilities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE = 'DISAB' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD'))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Count of No Disability
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE = 'DISAB' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION IN ('No Disability', 'No Disability Recorded') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS IN ('ON') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Total No Offndrs with disblty
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE = 'DISAB') GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Estalishment Name
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: No Disability info on NOMIS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE IS NULL)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Query 35
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_TYPE IN ('DISAB') AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION IN ('Refusal to Disclose', 'Refused to Disclose')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)
